page.title: 17THE RIVERSIDE
page.content: We first saw the Greenwich Pier. On this pier you can see the ferry which tourists and holidaymakers use to travel and sightsee up and down the river. These ferries are really pleasure boats. Behind the pier there is a Tourists Iformation Centre and the Cutty Sark. The thames is very polluted because of the boats coming in and out all the time. As you walk along the river you can see a power station. This building is very important for making power for LondonÂ£s underground, out of coal and oil. Its beside the river so that ships can bring the coal and oil beside the power station you can see the scrap metal works. it is near the river so that it can transport scrap metal.The harbour masters office is now used for doing office work in the offices here. along the river
